field.name: ceo_key
field.field_description: A duelist with this ceo will gain the modifier when deciding to kill/spare opponent in a duel

field.name: spare_kill_modifier
field.field_description: Contributes towards whether the ceos owner will prefer to kill or spare the opponent in duels. Use -ve values to add to the "spare" points, +ve to add to kill points. Range goes from -100 to +100 in code, where -100 is always spare and vice-versa
